name: test_e2e_with_logs[417_LDAP_ATTR_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `LDAP_ATTR_005` |
| **Name** | LDAP attribute injection via mail with encoded chars |
| **Category** | LDAP |
| **Subcategory** | attribute_injection |
| **Severity** | `MEDIUM` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `)(mail=admin@target.com`
- **Encoded**: `%29%28mail%3Dadmin%40target.com`

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
